name: In-Game Store Construct 3 Game | Android, iOS, HTML
name_original: In-Game Store Construct 3 Game | Android, iOS, HTML
description:
A simple project to demonstrate how to

  1. Create a table in Supabase
  2. Set up user authentication
  3. Save and fetch users' purchase items
  4. Set up in-game store

Note: This demo does not cover the payments.
